RNS Number : 8426ZAVEVA Group PLC27 January 2022

AVEVA Group plc

Changes to the membership of the Remuneration Committee

AVEVA Group plc announces that Rohinton Mobed, Independent Non-Executive Director, will step down from the Remuneration Committee effective 27 January 2022 and that Dr Ayesha Khanna , Independent Non-Executive Director, will join the Remuneration Committee with effect from the same date.

This announcement is made in accordance with Listing Rule 9.6.11.

Enquiries:

AVEVA Group plc

Matt Springett, Head of Investor Relations

+44 (0) 7789 818 684

FTI Consulting LLP

Edward Bridges/Dwight Burden

+44 (0) 20 3727 1000
